questions.question_text:
A company implements Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management for inventory operations.

When a server that runs the document routing service restarts, a user must manually sign in to start the Document Routing Agent.

The configuration delays outbound operations.

You need to configure the Document Routing Agent to automatically start when the server restarts.

Which technology should you use?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
DRA can be run as a service, and a service can be auto-started at machine startup. So this is the way to go.

Selected Answer: C
It can be executed as Windows service or desktop application, but the question points out "Automatically" so the answer would be Windows service.

questions.question_text:
A company is implementing Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.

You are helping the company use Subscription Estimator in Lifecycle Services (LCS).

You need to import data for the usage profile.

Which data source should you use?

discussion.content:
B is correct, probably not the best wording, but in setting the pause updates to Yes or NO, that is you setting the continuous update settings, 

A is not correct because the environment is already a Prod env. based on the question, Also updates happen automatically for not only the PROD, but Sand boxes as well.

Answer B: To set up continuous updates for a Dynamics 365 Finance production environment, follow these steps:

Access the Environment Details:
Sign in to the Power Platform admin center (https://admin.powerplatform.microsoft.com/).
Navigate to the Environments section.
Select the relevant production environment.
Configure Update Settings:
In the environment details, go to the Settings tab.
Click on Updates.
Choose the Continuous updates option.
Set your preferred autoupdate window (the time when updates are applied automatically).
Optionally, configure the pause updates settings if needed.
Monitor Updates:
Regularly check the release schedule for upcoming updates.
Microsoft provides release notes detailing the changes in each update.
Ensure that your environment remains up-to-date by allowing automatic updates during the specified window.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: A
I would say A

You will get continuous updates by having a production environment already. There is no setting for the frequency, just pause option: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/fin-ops-core/dev-itpro/lifecycle-services/pause-service-updates?toc=/dynamics365/commerce/toc.json So answer A

choices.D: Run the code upgrade service to analyze the code.
choices.B: Set update settings for continuous updates.
choices.C: Request the update through a service request.

questions.question_text:
A company is using Dynamics 365 Finance.
You need to ensure that the production environment always uses the latest service updates from Microsoft.
What should you recommend?

HOTSPOT
-

A company uses Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management.

A user reports an error on a transaction in the production environment that occurred 30 days ago.

You need to move the current data from the production environment to the sandbox environment to troubleshoot the transaction error. You must back up the sandbox environment before you copy data to the production environment.

What should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content: Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE) exists under the Enterprise agreement.

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP
-

A company plans to implement Dynamics 365 Finance and purchase licenses through an Enterprise Agreement (EA).

Development environments must be licensed for the duration of the implementation.

You need to recommend solutions for activating development environments that allows the company to manage costs based on usage.

What should you recommend? To answer, drag the appropriate solutions to the correct requirements.

Each requirement may be used once, more than once, or not at all. You may need to drag the split bar between panes or scroll to view content.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//
